educations.title: General engineering degree
content: I am currently studying at ENIB to become a general engineer in electronics, computer science and mechatronics.

educations.title: Volunteer as a Vacation Camp Animator
content: I was a volunteer animator for a vacation camp in the ESTIVAL association of the Mennaisian community.

educations.title: Sauveteur Secouriste du Travail - SST
content: Awarded of the Sauveteur Secouriste du Travail (First Aid at Work) certificate in Plouzané.
Realized with National Engineering School of Brest - ENIB.

educations.title: Scientific Baccalauréat
content: Awarded of Baccalauréat with distinction at Saint-Louis high school in Châteaulin (2012-2019).
- Specialization Computer Science and Digital Science
Realized with Saint-Louis high school in Châteaulin.

educations.title: BNSSA
content: Awarded of Brevet National de Sécurité et de Sauvetage Aquatique (National Aquatic Safety and Rescue Certificate) in Landerneau.
Thi is a French aquatic safety certification.

educations.title: Premiers Secours en Equipe de niveau 1 - PSE1
content: Awarded of Premiers Secours en Équipe de niveau 1 (the First Aid Team Level 1) certification in Landerneau.
Realized with the Sauveteurs Secouristes Léonards - SSL29.

educations.title: Solidarity journey in Haïti
content: Solidarity stay with young Haïtians from the Noël des Anges Centre (educational center for young people in advanced poverty).
Realized with Saint-Louis high school in Châteaulin.

educations.title: PET for School
content: Awarded PET for School in Brest.
